devdoc.details: Provides verifiable, auditable record of all signals that trigger shorts

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

returns.totalScore: Sum of all recent signal scores

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params.metadataHash: IPFS hash of full signal data

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

devdoc.title: SignalOracle

cleanExpiredSignals(address,string).notice: Clean up expired signals to save gas on reads

getConfidenceScore(address,string).notice: Get aggregated confidence score for a token

getRecentSignalIds(address,string).notice: Get recent signal IDs for position recording

getSignalHistory(address,string).notice: Get all signals for a token

publishSignalBatch((uint8,address,string.notice: Publish multiple signals in one transaction (gas efficient)

userdoc.notice: Publishes and aggregates AI agent signals on-chain
